text: I ve Gone HollowThe only reason I m still alive is my younger siblings  but right now when I can t even see them  it s easy to forget what keeps me    People always had high expectations about me   It s like a weighted chain I wore around my neck   High expectations but no tolerance for mistakes and eventually no faith in me I m not even a person am I   I m just their problem I think I think I ve finally lost hope   I ll keep on living  but I don t think from this point forward that I ll ever be truly happy again   I ve seen too much   Felt too much I m not even tired anymore   Just apathetic   Nothing but grey Most people won t get it but fuck them I guess   I hate to be like this but  I ve never had the support I needed anyways   Only what was convenient at the time This world is totally fucked   Why do I have to feel guilty for saying that when it s self evident   Why do I have to feel guilt for trying to be who I am I gave it my best shot   I really did   Not that anyone ever fucking believed me when I told them Whether I kill myself or not doesn t matter anymore   I m effectively dead either way   A ghost who only remains attached because of the obligations they have to others   I literally am only alive because of other people I ve given up on myself in this life   I feel terrible about it but if there s a way out of this hole for someone as poor and inexperienced as I am I d love to hear it   Everything out there is sadly paywalled  and it doesn t matter in the end how smart you are if you don t have the goods to spend Let this act of surrender by my last selfish defiance   I was nothing   am nothing  and will return to nothing
summary: People always had high expectations about me. They had no tolerance for mistakes and eventually no faith in me. The only reason I'm still alive is my younger siblings. I don't think I'll ever be truly happy again.
cleaned: people high expectation no tolerance mistake eventually no faith reason alive young sibling not think truly happy
